DOC.brief_summary: The propose study evaluate effectiveness Osteopathic manipulation sacro-iliac joint ( SIJ ) lumbar spine symptomatic female interstitial cystitis ( IC ) patient sacro-iliac joint dysfunction . It predict Osteopathic manipulation period 12 week result subjective index increase comfort objective index low O'Leary-Sant Questionnaire , Pelvic Floor Impact Questionnaire ( PIFQ-7 ) , Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) SF-12 score , low visual analog score pain urgency , decreased frequency void diary great variation resting/contraction perineometry score .
DOC.brief_title: Osteopathic Manipulation Female Interstitial Cystitis Patients With Sacroiliac Joint Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: Patients evaluate examined Osteopathic physician . This examination consist full osteopathic structural exam , focus examination sacroiliac joint surround musculature . Subjects treat base objective finding examination . Since structural exam include whole body , structural abnormality likely identify possible require treatment aid treatment SIJD . Subjects also teach stretch routine order aid treatment dysfunction . Our control group receive structural exam , focused examination . Their treatment involve massage , area associate musculature SIJ . This serve identify possible placebo effect , associate simply provide heal touch without focused treatment . All subject evaluate standardized IC questionnaire time initial visit subsequently re-evaluated questionnaire 4 week interval . The patient follow 6 month treatment evaluate time .
DOC.criteria: Female At least 18 year age Patients osteopathic dysfunction Patients Diagnosis IC Sacroiliac joint dysfunction Patients currently stable treatment regimen IC past one month Patients currently undergo physical therapy pelvic floor dysfunction SI joint dysfunction Patients use narcotic , skeletal muscle relaxant , bladder instillation past month Willingness participate trial signing informed consent Pregnancy Pelvic Masses Patients Interstim neuromodulator implant Patients require narcotic , bladder instillation , skeletal muscle relaxant History vaginal abdominal pelvic surgery within last 3 month Having bladder overdistention within last 1 month Malignancy Known spinal arthropathy Hip replacement surgical stabilization Herniated disk Spinal stenosis
